name: ａｌｇｏｃｕｔｓ - san
description: ａｌｇｏｃｕｔｓ are the renders of audiovisual experiments I have been doing since 2018, where I recontextualize ready-made videos from Youtube using algorithmic patterns. The algorithm fetches random videos from Youtube, or takes videos from Audioset dataset from Google, and generates weird Frankenstein mashups with granular slices. And the results are mostly photomoshed for some reason lol. Enjoy the weirdness!
